snippet.title: Aftercharge - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
AFTERCHARGE is a 3 vs 3 competitive game pitting invisible robots against an invincible security squad in high-octane tactical skirmishes. The robots must sneak around to destroy all the energy extractors on the site while the guards are tasked to spot the attackers and stop them.

Releasing on Nintendo Switch, Xbox One and PC with cross-platform multiplayer in the Summer of 2018.

Steam Store Page : http://store.steampowered.com/app/492760/Aftercharge/

Join the community : http://www.discord.gg/aftercharge
Follow the tweets : http://www.twitter.com/aftercharge
